Subject: connection for linux client does not work
Description: Install is successful, but the EPP Client application does not show any server connection, and the machine does not appear in the Web UI
What_We_Know__c:
Customer encounter connectivity issues with the clients on the Linux OS

This happened after they installed the client.
Next_Steps__c:
We will gather more details regarding this issue
Schedule a remote session to check the cause
Solution_Comment__c: We managed to resolve the issue by uncommenting also the export lines within the options.sh file, when we reinstalled the latest EPP client then the agent communicated with the EPP Server as expected.Â  This case is now closed.
